snippet: Jermaine Lawson, a Jamaican cricket star who moved to Brooklyn after his career faded, re-entered international competition last month, playing on the United States national team.
abstract: Update on Jermaine Lawson, Jamaican cricket star who moved to Brooklyn after controversy marred his career at home; Lawson has returned to professional international competitive cricket in Malaysia as a player for the United States national team.
lead_paragraph: Jermaine Lawson, a Jamaican cricket star who moved to Brooklyn after his career faded, re-entered international competition last month, playing on the United States national team.

headline.print_headline: For a Brooklyn Cricketer, Extra Innings
headline.seo: Jermaine Lawson Returns to International Cricket Competition
headline.main: For a Brooklyn Cricketer, Extra Innings
